revision.text:
'''Kalos''' est la sixième [[Regions|Région]] dans le monde de Pokéclicker. Le Pokédex de cette région contient 72 Pokémon, de Marisson #650 à Volcanion #721. [[File:Kalos_V0.9.11.png|thumb|La carte de la région de Kalos]] ===[[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Villes]] et [[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Magasins]]=== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Bourg Croquis]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Quarellis]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Neuvartault]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Illumis]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Fort-Vanitas]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Roche-sur-Gliffe]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Relifac-le-Haut]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Cromlac'h]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Yantreizh]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Port Tempères]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Romant-sous-Bois]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|La Frescale]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Fluselles]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Mozheim]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Relifac-le-Haut]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Ligue de Kalos]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Bastiques]] |- |} ===Routes=== ''Voir [[Route Statistics|Statistiques des Routes]] pour plus d'informations.'' {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! ===Walkthrough=== [[File:Kalos_Flow_Chart_Updated.png|500px]]
*Team Flare Secret HQ is located in Geosenge Town *After defeating the Snowbelle City Gym, clearing either Route 21 or Route 22 can unlock Victory Road Kalos
